name: Pachelbel's canon
description:
Help Sgt.P fend off the wave of cat soldiers using the power of your voice to shoot a cannon. You win if you can defeat the final boss.

Controls:

  • Your pitch controls the angle whilst your volume controls the power of your shots.
  • If you have multiple microphones attached to your computer, you can try inputting a number into the square in the top-right of the menu to change which microphone is being used
  • Use the boxes in the menu to adjust how you want your voice to be input. Try to adjust the values so that you can move the icon in the graph around comfortably with your voice. 
  • PROTIP - If you're finding it hard to control the cannon's angle, try humming with your mouth closed instead.
  • If you are experiencing mic issues (crackling, not working), try clicking somewhere outside the game window, then click back in as fast as you can. ALT-Tab works as well.
    • If you are experiencing significant mic delay after doing this, try doing again even faster. The delay is linked to how fast you do this.
